review: Yohimbe increased bouts of anxiety, general feeling of nausea, will never take again, dry mouth all day even though drinking water.

I was foaming out of my mouth, nearly vomiting, anxiety and physical discomfort was at its worst,  I could not urinate even though I had to, I severe hunger and I was in this condition for several hours. Needless to say, I did not or could not have sex. Be aware of yohimbe. It was terrifying.
Aside from the sexual benefit I find what I appreciate most from yohimbe is my improvement in energy. Big improvement.
It causes a rapid heartbeat and can cause blood pressure to increase, which is dangerous for people that have hypertension.
